title: Booker has 'unfinished business' with Suns
summary: Devin Booker remains the leader of the Suns as they aim to recover from challenging seasons. He is still in his prime and ready to guide the team forward.

title: Suns bring back Nash in senior adviser role
summary: Steve Nash, a Hall of Fame guard and former MVP, returns to the Suns as a senior adviser. He was originally drafted by Phoenix in 1996.

title: New coach, higher expectations for Knicks
summary: The Knicks enter the Mike Brown era with a new coach and elevated expectations. Media Day marks the official start of this new chapter.

title: Zion's mindset: 'Whatever my team needs'
summary: Zion Williamson, now slimmer and 25 years old, is prepared to take on more responsibility for the Pelicans. He aims to lead by example this season.

title: Wolves, 76ers unveil Classic Edition uniforms
summary: Minnesota and Philadelphia reveal new Classic Edition jerseys for the upcoming season. These uniforms pay homage to their respective histories.

title: Report: Rockets' VanVleet suffers torn ACL
summary: Fred VanVleet is expected to miss the 2025-26 season due to a torn right ACL. The injury was reported by multiple sources.

title: Knicks' Hart set to wear splint this season
summary: Josh Hart plans to delay surgery and wear a splint this season to stay on the court. He expressed discomfort with wearing anything on his hands.

title: Cavs' Garland (toe) will be limited in camp
summary: Darius Garland underwent surgery on his injured big toe, which affected him during the playoffs. He will have limited participation in training camp.

title: Film Study: How Cavs can improve defense
summary: Despite ranking 8th overall, last season marked Cleveland's worst defensive performance in four years. A film study explores areas for improvement.

title: The Athletic: Impact of VanVleet's injury
summary: Fred VanVleet's injury leaves Houston vulnerable in the backcourt after an offseason focused on big forwards and centers. The Rockets face challenges in depth.

title: 2025-26 Season Preview: Washington Wizards
summary: The Wizards enter the season with promising young talents and veteran CJ McCollum. Fans have reasons for optimism as the team rebuilds.

title: 2025-26 Season Preview: Minnesota Timberwolves
summary: The Timberwolves aim to advance past the Western Conference Finals this season. The team looks to build on its recent progress.
